## SimpleProduct.websites property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> The field should not be used on the storefront.
> 

An array of websites in which the product is available.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
websites?: Maybe<Array<Maybe<Website>>>;
```
